biotools.summary: An iterative clustering method for single-cell RNA sequencing data | Single-cell Panoramic View Clustering (PanoView) | PanoView is an iterative PCA-based method that integrates with a novel density-based clustering, ordering local maximum by convex hull (OLMC) algorithm, to identify cell subpopulations for single-cell RNA-sequencing. For details of the method, please see our paper at PLOS Computational Biology (https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1007040)
